definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: Meanwhile, there are more than 70 Chinese-funded businesses in Brazil and 300 Brazilian-funded businesses in China.
sentences.chinese: 同时，中国在巴西投资兴建了70多家企业。

sentences.english: He fled to Brazil trying to escape the long armof the law.
sentences.chinese: 他逃到巴西，企图逃避恢恢法网。

sentences.english: Brazilian defender Emilson Cribari says he's settled at Lazio.
sentences.chinese: 巴西后卫克里巴里说他会留在拉齐奥。

sentences.english: Different teams work on the Bolivia site and the Brazil site.
sentences.chinese: 玻利维亚站点和巴西站点由不同的团队负责。

sentences.english: Lippi overlooks last summer's Confederations Cup, in which his team lost to Egypt and Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 里皮回想去在联合会杯上他的队伍输给埃及和巴西后。

sentences.english: Ipanema Beach in Rio De Janeiro, Brazil, at night.
sentences.chinese: 巴西里约热内卢的伊帕内玛海滩的夜晚。

sentences.english: I lay 100 dollars Brazilian team will be the champion.
sentences.chinese: 我赌100美元，巴西队将是冠军。

sentences.english: The slate in 2016, held in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 2016年夏奥会在巴西的里约热内卢举行。

sentences.english: Brazilia is the modern capital of Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 巴西利亚是巴西现在的首都。

sentences.english: Brazilia is the modern capital of Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 巴西利亚是巴西现在的首都。

sentences.english: This makes him the most popular Brazilian president since 1990.
sentences.chinese: 这让他成为了自1990年以来最受欢迎的巴西总统。

sentences.english: I'm looking for a link builder for a brazilian mini games site.
sentences.chinese: 我正在寻找一个为巴西迷你游戏网站链接建设者。

sentences.english: Her next performance is scheduled for Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 她下一场演出已经定在巴西。

sentences.english: The studies didn't include pine nuts or Brazil nuts.
sentences.chinese: 这些研究没有包括松仁或者巴西坚果。

sentences.english: UN Secretary-General Ban Ki- moon has also extended his condolences.
sentences.chinese: 联合国秘书长潘基文也对巴西火灾遇难者表示哀悼。

sentences.english: Moreover, the economy was prone to slumps and episodes of hyperinflation.
sentences.chinese: 而且，当时的巴西经济很可能出现萧条或是极度通胀。

definition: Côte d'Ivoire or Ivory Coast in West Africa
